name: freezerTemperature_setValue
description: This function is used to set the freezer temperature of a refrigerator.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to set the freezer temperature.

parameters.name: predefinedCompartment
parameters.description: The predefined compartment to set the temperature for.

parameters.name: settingTemperature
parameters.description: The temperature value to set for the freezer.

parameters.name: predefinedSettingTemperatureUnit
parameters.description: The unit of the temperature value to set for the freezer.
